name: File Revealer
body:
![File Revealer In The Wild](http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7195/6902764668_a370f40f89_b_d.jpg)

![File Revealer in use!](http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7201/7048900427_a6fbeb2115_d.jpg)


**File Revealer is open source, so feel free to download the code and mess around. Works on Mac OS X 10.6+.**
**Took two weeks (characterized by school work and amazing debate tournaments) to create using Objective-C and Photoshop.**
tagline: A lightweight status bar application for revealing your Mac's hidden files.
